column1: What is the first step to update Ubuntu packages?
column2: The first step is to open the terminal and run the command 'sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo snap refresh'.

column1: How to disable power save for Intel Wi-Fi?
column2: To disable power save for Intel Wi-Fi, run the command 'sudo sed -i '/^wifi.powersave = 3$/s/3/2/' /etc/NetworkManager/conf.d/default-wifi-powersave-on.conf' after checking if power save is on with 'iw dev $interface get power_save'.

column1: What is the purpose of the first command in Step 2?
